original_title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Good, the Bad and the Stupid: The Misadventures of Bulk and Skull
overview: During their three side-splitting seasons on the Fox Children's Network's wildly successful series "Mighty Morphin Power Rangers," this wacky duo has gone from being the bad-guys you-love-to-hate to junior-cops-without-a-clue. And when they find themselves trapped in a cave, their madcap memories make for a hysterically hilarious 50 minutes of fun. Both kids and parents alike will love watching Angel Grove's funniest citizens as they deliver loads of laughs from the past and the present.
title: Mighty Morphin Power Rangers: The Good, the Bad and the Stupid: The Misadventures of Bulk and Skull
